REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2256 reute u f BC-3M-<MMM>-CANNOT-ACCOU 03-19 0055

TEXT.TITLE: 3M <MMM> CANNOT ACCOUNT FOR STOCK RISE
TEXT.BODY: Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing Co knows of no reason for the rise in its stock, trading at 129, up 3-1/4 on the New York Stock Exchange, a company spokeswoman told Reuters. She said the company had issued no news today that might account for the increase. Reuter
